Remove nautilus bookmarks from sidebarhttp://localhost:3000/notes/remove-nautilus-bookmarks-from-sidebar/Fri, 22 Apr 2016 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/remove-nautilus-bookmarks-from-sidebar/Edit 2 files and log back in: ~/.config/user-dirs.dirs /etc/xdg/user-dirs.defaults
